title: refactor(simple-http): replace magic timeout numbers with named constants
body:
## Issue
File: `src/simple/SocketSimple-http.c`
Lines: 72-73

**Pattern:** MAGIC_TIMEOUT_30000, MAGIC_TIMEOUT_60000
**Severity:** MEDIUM
**Category:** Refactoring

## Description
Magic numbers 30000 and 60000 are used directly for default timeout values in `Socket_simple_http_options_init`:

```c
opts->connect_timeout_ms = 30000;
opts->request_timeout_ms = 60000;
```

These magic numbers reduce code readability and make it harder to maintain consistent timeout values across the codebase.

## Recommendation
Define named constants at the top of the file:

```c
#define SOCKET_SIMPLE_DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS 30000
#define SOCKET_SIMPLE_DEFAULT_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS 60000
```

Then use them:

```c
opts->connect_timeout_ms = SOCKET_SIMPLE_DEFAULT_CONNECT_TIMEOUT_MS;
opts->request_timeout_ms = SOCKET_SIMPLE_DEFAULT_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_MS;
```

## Impact
- Improves code readability
- Makes timeout values easier to maintain and adjust
- Follows project code style guidelines from CLAUDE.md
